CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 20, 1969, page 1 reads: "BCC Leaders and Marchers - The city's "Black Monday" demonstration march in behalf of the Black Construction Coalition's drive to gain construction jobs for blacks was led by BCC leaders and included an estimated 10,000 persons."
TitMainTitle: Black Construction Coalition Black Monday demonstration led by Byrd Brown, Rev. Jimmy Joe Robinson, Mike Desmond, photographer Coles, and police chief William "Mugsy" Moore, with man standing on van in background
CatSubject_tab: Picketing--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Robinson, Jimmy Joe.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Brown, Byrd, 1929-Desmond, Mike.Civil rights demonstrations--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
